item.title: Has the Fed Improved US Economic Performance?
item.description:
The introduction of the Federal Reserve in the US in 1913 marked a turning point in US and global economics, followed by the abondance of the gold standard by the Fed in 1933.

I want to share my learnings from a study published by Thomas. L. Hogan in 2014 about the impact of the Federal Reserve on the US economices:

Has the Fed Improved U.S. Economic Performance?
